| Language                    | C/C++          |
| Specification               | OpenGL         |
| API - gl                    | Version 4.1    |
| API - gles1                 | None           |
| API - gles2                 | None           |
| API - gles3                 | None           |
| Profile                     | Core           |
| Extensions                  | default values |
| Options - Generate a loader | yes            |
| Omit KHR                    | no             |
| Local Files                 | no             |
